choice.line: You selling a lot of music?
Not enough to quit my part time job, but enough to make me feel as though I am having an impact on the world.
It must be a great feeling to have loving fans who await hearing more of your beautiful voice, including me.
You write any new songs recently?
I've just recently composed a new CD full of songs. You want to give one a listen? I'll perform part of one live for you.

The kings and queens are running wild, lonely for each other. Princes gallant, are no more staying under cover. Jesters' jokes aren't even funny, poking fun at sorrow. Lords and ladies hoard their riches fearful for tomorrow.
Oh, Mr. Pine doesn't wait till after nine. There's not a friend he's had to buy. Keeps his head above the sky. Ain't got much, and he don't ask why.
Pays the price, works the seasons through. Frozen days, he thinks of you. Cold as ice, but he burns for you. Mother Russia, can't you hear him too?
Your music always is so deep in meaning. I love it!
Emere, you've said that at least 30 times already. I get it.
Words can't describe how perfect your music is. It conveys every thought and idea ever conceived on this planet.
I just try my best to create unique music with unusual tempos to spice up the music world.
Well, you're doing a fabulous job.

converse.line: Hey, can you help me out?
Sure, anything for my good friend.
Can I record you singing a song I have? It's a beautiful song that I want to hear sung in your voice.
Sure...These lyrics seem like something I would write. Huh. Anyway, I've got recording equipment here and a CD you can use.
Tried to take it all away. Learn her freedom just inside a day. And find her soul. To find their fears allayed.
Sleeping dreams will reach for her. She cannot say the words they need. She knows she's alone. And she is free.
Then she met a hollow soul. Filled him with her light. And was consoled she was the moon. And he, the sun was gold.
